physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No specific physical examination details directly provided other than the association with psychomotor delay and his physical growth parameters.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's weight decreased from 3065 grams at birth to 2700 grams at 1 month old. He also developed worsening abdominal distension and pseudo obstructions by 2 months old.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: He was defecating 14-18 times a day and was dependent on total parenteral nutrition.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient continued to experience frequent diarrhea, and his weight was critically low for his age.
